events.comment: for more examples and templates visit gametemplates.itch.io

if the status of level1 does not exist in storage, that indicates this is the first time we run the game
Lock all level buttons except level1 and write these values in to storage

if the status of level1 exist in storage, we should have this info for all level buttons in storage
read these values from storage and store them inside object variables for each button object

all button stored inside a group
set their animation using the object variable to display their status
the animation name is the same as the value

if touch or left mouse button is down and mouse/touch is on level button and the variable 'status' of the object is "Unlocked", go to that level
if status is 'Locked', do nothing

objects.name: Title
objects.string: Well Done! You have completed the level.

events.comment: we have completed the game, unlock the next level and write it in to storage so when we go back to level selection, it is going to read the new value from storage and we should have the next level unlocked
if button is pressed, go back to level selection
